column4: Mem:    191968k total,   188288k used,     3680k free,    49508k buffers <-- how to make more free memory ?
You don't need more free memory
is ubuntu will do that 4 me ?
if some app requires more memory, the OS will free some from the cache.
Linux always uses all the RAM it can
Tasks:  74 total,   1 running,  73 sleeping,   0 stopped,   0 zombie
if apps don't need it, Linux caches stuff so you can access it faster.
I think you have too much free memory there. :D
maybe Linux just hasn't found use for it yet :/
